text: It's ironic that it's colder in Florida than it was in Vail..

Thanksgiving cooking advice - don't add nuts, fruit or anything else to stuffing - it ruins an American delicacy

Playing golf @ Trump International - Happy Thanksgiving all...
@StarJonesEsq I just spoke to the chef and he wants to know what "velveeta" is :)
@StarJonesEsq I need to finally see these cooking skills you were telling me about… if they don’t work out, come join us at Mar-a-Lago!
@melrobbins You sound like Lara - just send me you last marathon time and when I destroy it, you and Chris can take me to a victory dinner.
@melrobbins Mel – I love the aggressiveness at 9am – the reason you are one of my favorite people in the world... ET
